犎字的基本解释

犎
fēng
〔犎牛〕一种野牛，背上肉突起，像驼峰，如“西域诸国献汗血马、火浣布、犎犎、孔雀、巨象及诸珍异二百馀品。”

犎字的汉语字典释义

[①]［fēng］
［《廣韻》府容切，平鍾，非。］
野牛。参见“犎牛”。

犎字的康熙字典解释

【巳集下】【牛字部】　犎； 康熙笔画：13； 页码：页702第27
【廣韻】甫容切【集韻】【韻會】方容切，?音封。【玉篇】野牛也。【集韻】牛名。領上肉犦胅起如橐駞。【爾雅·釋畜註】犦牛，卽犎牛。【司馬相如·上林賦】庸旄貘犛。【註】師古曰：庸牛，卽今之犎牛。　又或作封。【前漢·西域傳】罽賔出封牛。【註】師古曰：封牛，項上隆起者也。亦作峰。【後漢·順帝紀】疏勒國獻獅子封牛。【註】封牛，其領上肉隆起若封然，因以名之。卽今之峰牛。　【集韻】或作㸼。 考證：〔【集韻】牛名。領上肉犦然起如橐駞。〕　謹照原文然改胅。

犎字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
犎字的起名意思

野牛。

犎
Basic explanation of words
犎
fēng
[Cattle] A type of bison with protruding flesh on its back, like a hump, such as "The Western Regions donated horses with sweat and blood, fire cloths, 犎犎, peacocks, giant elephants, and more than 200 rare items."
犎
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［fēng］
["Guangyun" Fu Rongqie, Pingzhong, Fei. ]
Bison. See "Cattle".
犎
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【Si Ji 2】【Cow Character Department】　犎; Kangxi Strokes: 13; Page Number: Page 702 27
[Guangyun] Fu Rongqie [Jiyun] [Yunhui] Fang Rongqie, sound seal. [Jade articles] Bison also. 【Jiyun】The name of the cow. The meat squat on the collar rises like a scorpion. 【Erya·Release Animal Note】Ya Niu, Yiyi Niu. 【Sima Xiangru·Shanglin Fu】Yonghuan tapir. [Note] Shigu said: Yong Niu, Yi Niu today.　Or make a seal. [Previous Han · Western Regions Biography] The scorpion came out of the zebu. [Note] Shigu said: Fengniu, the one with uplift on the top. Also as a peak. [Later Han·Shun Di Ji] Shule Kingdom presented lions and confessed bulls. [Note] Sealed cattle, the meat on its collar is swelling if sealed, because of its name. This is the peak of cattle.　【Ji Yun】or Zuo 㸼. Textual research: [[Jiyun] Niu name. The meat on the collar sprang up like a chariot. 〕 　 I would like to change the corpse according to the original text.
